modules.description: This module represents positions in input sources using byte offsets, lines, and columns. It provides conversion from Lexing positions, offset-based construction, and shifting operations. It is used to track and manipulate positions in files or strings during parsing or analysis tasks.

This module represents input sources for reading content, supporting operations to create inputs from files, strings, bytes, or input channels. It provides low-level control over input handling through custom seek, read, and line offset functions, enabling precise management of input streams. Concrete use cases include parsing source files, processing text buffers, or handling input from external streams with random access requirements.

This module handles input source representation and position tracking for parsing and analysis tasks. It provides precise location handling using byte offsets, lines, and columns, along with customizable location-aware output formatting. Use it to parse files, analyze text buffers, or display source code excerpts with accurate positioning and styled highlighting.
